item.title: Need a coder to check this for errors
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

title says all ;D

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“blackmark”))
{
if (playerRights >= 1)

	{
		String player = command.substring(10);
		//appendToPunishmentblackmark(player);  (don't bother with this, everything here is below)
		blackmark = (blackmark + 1);
			BufferedWriter bw = null;
			try {
				bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("criminal/records/punishlog.txt", true));
				bw.write(playerName + " gave " + player + " a blackmark");
					 bw.newLine();
					 bw.flush();
		      }  catch (IOException ioe) {
			 ioe.printStackTrace();
		      } finally {
			 if (bw != null) try {
			    bw.close();
			 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
			    sendMessage("Error giving " + player + " a blackmark!");
			 }
		      }

   }
}
else if (command.startsWith("jail"))
{
	if (playerRights >= 1)
	{
		String player = command.substring(5);
		//appendToPunishmentjail(player);       (don't bother with this, everything here is below)
	injail = (injail + 1);
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("criminal/records/blackmarklog.txt", true));
		bw.write(playerName + " put " + player + " in jail");
			 bw.newLine();
			 bw.flush();
      }  catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error putting " + player + " in jail!");
	 }
      }

   }

}[/code]

Read full topic
